title: A Conversation Between Mother and Daughter
story: Hello Mary. How was school today? It was great, mom. Thanks. Do you have any homework? Yes. I do, in math and English. Have something to eat first. Okay, mom. You can do homework after dinner. Sounds good, mom. Thank you.
summary: A mother and daughter have a conversation about school and homework.
image: An image of a mother and daughter talking at the dinner table.
